description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Just another puzzle game? WRO-ONG! TriLinea ReAct is an new type of game that could easily be described as a Fighting Puzzle game. Real time fast-paced battles on a shared board that will reinvent the old and good match-3 formula. Build your strategies, cast spells, summon specials and prove no one will ever be able to overcome your skills. So now, stop reading and give it a try!
description.short: Just another puzzle game? WRO-ONG! TriLinea ReAct is an new type of game that could easily be described as a Fighting Puzzle game. Real time fast-paced battles on a shared board that will reinvent the old and good match-3 formula. Build your strategies, cast spells, summon specials and prove no one will ever be able to overcome your skills. So now, stop reading and give it a try!
